Title: Killer Carl
Writer: John Wells (developed for american television by), Paul Abbott (creator), Mike O'Malley
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Justin Chatwin, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: When a letter from Carl's teacher arrives at the Gallagher home, Fiona is thrown into action to prove it's a suitable domicile for rehabilitating a delinquent.
